title: Master Duan’s Beloved Wife: A Lovely Spendthrift - Novel Updates
tags: Doting Love Interests   Doting Older Siblings   Early Romance   Female Protagonist   Lucky Protagonist   Wealthy Characters
author: Xi Zhao   夕照
description:
He Yueyu should have been thankful to what she had been blessed with, a pretty face, a slender figure, a super-rich family, and three handsome brothers who always love her. But she craved for freedom and wanted to live a life in her own way. The first time she tried to taste the forbidden fruit, she encountered Mr. Duan. A romantic love story ensued.
“You’ve never done that? Let me teach you.” Before he realized it, she was already on the top of him...>
